Archive_Addon_Paragraph: New entry called data retention under company profile. It will allow to define archive policy for operational data - activities, transactions, transaction lines (loading to nucleus).
Archive_Addon_Schedule_Paragraph: Set a weekly schedule here. the module will include configuration mode based on activity history and advance mode(for system admin) allowing build advance login using code.
Archive_Addon_Policy_Paragraph: One number in months defining the data retention per all objects - global history(in months) to be aloaded to the operational data and option to define it per object.
Archive_Addon_SelectDaysTitle: Select a day of the week
Addon_Archive_DeleteModal_Paragraph: Are you sure you want to remove the object from the list?
Addon_Archive_PublishModal_Success: All your data is saved and will be operational for next run
Addon_Archive_PublishModal_Failure: Publish data process has failed. Error message: {0}
